p: To determine the cutoff value for the sandwich ELISA, 60 H3-free samples, including chicken cloacal swab samples and tissue samples, were tested with the developed sandwich ELISA, and the average (X) and standard deviation (SD) of the OD 450nm values of the 60 samples were calculated. X + 3SD was the cutoff value. A sample with an OD 450nm greater than or equal to the cutoff value was considered positive, and a sample with a value less than the cutoff value was considered negative.
